entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • With Workload sets, upgrading the SDK feature band doesn't recognize the previously installed workload set #42502
    9.0.2xx
  • Native AOT document URL opens up unexpected website #42492
  • Project reference version defaults to 1.0.0.0 in `*.deps.json` file #42490

Closed

  • Duende.IdentityServer.Storage nugget 6.2.4 to 6.2.5 getting NU3018 while restoring packages #42493
  • Let `dotnet new mstest` can take argument to support os-specific framework #34086
  • [NETSDKE2E]Warning "NU1903: Package 'System.Text.Json' 6.0.0 has a known high severity vulnerability, https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-hh2w-p6rv-4g7w" displays after building mstest project in CLI. #42091

PullRequests

Created

  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Sidestep telemetry null writing by writing empty strings #42499
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Exclude bincore directory in diff test #42498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Handle Test Information from the New Testing Platform #42494
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
